hm.binkley.xio

Interface XSeekable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XMarkable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XByteBufferInputOutputStream

    public interface XSeekable
extends XMarkable
    XSeekable represents seekable I/O streams: those which may be programmatically moved to another read/write position.
    Author:
    B. K. Oxley (binkley)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  XSeekable.Whence
      Marker of relative nature of offset for seek(long, Whence).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void reset()
      Resets the position to the most recent mark using seek(mark(), SET.
      default void rewind()
      Restores the stream to its initial postion.
      long seek(long offset, XSeekable.Whence whence)
      Moves the current stream position to the given offset relative to whence.
      default long size() 
      default long tell()
      Gets the current stream position without changing it.

      • Methods inherited from interface hm.binkley.xio.XMarkable

        mark, mark

    • Method Detail

      • seek

        long seek(long offset,
          @Nonnull
          XSeekable.Whence whence)
   throws IOException
        Moves the current stream position to the given offset relative to whence.

        No combination of offset and whence may refer beyond the stream limits. If whence is XSeekable.Whence.SET offset must be positive. If whence is XSeekable.Whence.END offset must be negative. If whence is XSeekable.Whence.CUR offset may be positive or negative.

        Parameters:
        offset - the offset
        whence - the relative position, never missing
        Returns:
        the new file position
        Throws:
        IOException - if seek fails or offset is out of range for the stream relative to whence

      • size

        default long size()
           throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
        Pending:
        What is going on here? Won't this leave the stream at the end?

      • tell

        default long tell()
           throws IOException
        Gets the current stream position without changing it.
        Returns:
        the current stream position, always non-negatives
        Throws:
        IOException - if seek fails

      • rewind

        default void rewind()
             throws IOException
        Restores the stream to its initial postion.
        Throws:
        IOException - if seek fails

      • reset

        default void reset()
            throws IOException
        Resets the position to the most recent mark using seek(mark(), SET.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface XMarkable
        Throws:
        IOException - if this stream has not been marked or if the mark has been invalidated.
        See Also:
        XMarkable.mark(long), IOException
